definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">kill @e[type=minecraft:item_display,distance=..0.1]</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">-0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon tadpole ~ ~ ~ {Invulnerable:1,PersistenceRequired:1,Silent:1,NoAI:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:24,Amplifier:0,Duration:999999,ShowParticles:0b}]}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
